data.message: Hi i try to merge two my business pages and the wrong was deleted :( my 4 years work disappear in 1 minute.How i can get it back?i know i chose to keep the right page,i dont know how its possible it was dgone?!. All my info,all clients,all post ,review its gone.People can not text me too,when they trying go on my page its not works. :( but likes it was combined.Its any chance it can be recovered? Thanks
